item.title: Thanksgiving dinner #1
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: We made three pies yesterday to bring to dinner last night at John & Deborah's: Rumrunner's Pecan Pie Praline-Pumpkine Pie Orange Crusted Pumpkin Pie with Bourbon Whipped Cream John's mother, his brother and his family was there too. Dinner was delicious and there was plenty of wine, of course. We left at about 12:30am, after Gay had one too many scotches and danced the evening away with Deborah. :)
